Job Description: Primary Skills (Must)    5 years of solid software development experience and exposure to largescale, software Implementations.   Extensive Experience on Web application development using C#, ASP.NET, MVC 4, LINQ, ADO.net Entity framework and SQL Server 2014 and above   Strong Object Oriented design skills with excellent knowledge/usage of Design patterns.   Extensive Experience in using WCF Service, REST Web Service and Web API.   Experience on jQuery and Angular    Experience in Design, Development, Debug and Unit Testing using .NET Technologies   Experience with Agile Development Practices, particularly Scrum.   Strong interest in industry trends, technology innovation, and best practices.   Exposure to Azure, Azure devops (CI\CD, Code review tools, DevOps automation), Micro Services is a plus.   Good written and verbal communication skills.   Should be able to deliver work on time.   Secondary Skills (Preferred)    Hand-on experience in designing application by using UML, OOPS and Visio.   Hand-on experience in JSON, Ajax, CSS3, Bootstrap.   Effective in working independently and collaboratively in teams   Hand-on experience in version control tools (SVN/TFS).
